verses.verse: These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H5489>Suph<s%>, between <S%H6290>Paran<s%>, and <S%H8603>Tophel<s%>, and <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, and <S%H2698>Hazeroth<s%>, and <S%H1774>Di-zahab<s%>.
It is <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' journey from <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> unto <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, according unto all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had given him in commandment unto <S%H6680>them<s%>;

after <S%H310><s%> he had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%>, at <S%H154>Edrei<s%>.
Beyond <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, <S%H2974>began<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H874>declare<s%> this <S%H8451>law<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto us in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Ye have <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> long <S%H7227>enough<s%> in this <S%H2022>mountain<s%>:

turn <S%H6437><s%> <S%H5265>you<s%>, and take your journey, and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and unto all the places <S%H7934>nigh<s%> <S%H6160>thereunto<s%>, in the Arabah, in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>, and in the <S%H8219>lowland<s%>, and in the <S%H5045>South<s%>, and by <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H2348>sea-shore<s%>, the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, as far as the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>you<s%>: go in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them and to their <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>.
And I <S%H559>spake<s%> unto you at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> you myself <S%H905>alone<s%>:
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H3117>you<s%>, and, behold, ye are this day as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, make you a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> as many <S%H3254>as<s%> ye <S%H1288>are<s%>, and bless <S%H1696>you<s%>, as he hath promised you!
How <S%H349><s%> can I myself alone <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H2960>cumbrance<s%>, and your <S%H4853>burden<s%>, and your <S%H7379>strife<s%>?

Take <S%H3051><s%> you <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H995>understanding<s%>, and <S%H3045>known<s%>, according to your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> them heads over <S%H7218>you<s%>.
And ye <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>me<s%>, and said, The <S%H1697>thing<s%> which thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> for us to <S%H6213>do<s%>.

So I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H3045>known<s%>, and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> over <S%H8269>you<s%>, captains of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H6235>tens<s%>, and <S%H7860>officers<s%>, according to your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>.

And I <S%H6680>charged<s%> your <S%H8199>judges<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the causes between your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%> between a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and the sojourner that is with <S%H1616>him<s%>.

Ye shall not <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; ye shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6996>small<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1481>alike<s%>; ye shall not be afraid of the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%>; for the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%>'s: and the <S%H1697>cause<s%> that is too <S%H7185>hard<s%> for you ye shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, and I will hear it.
And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at that <S%H6256>time<s%> all the <S%H1697>things<s%> which ye should <S%H6213>do<s%>.

And we <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, and went <S%H3212>through<s%> all that <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> which ye <S%H7200>saw<s%>, by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H935>us<s%>; and we came to <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%>.
And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H935>you<s%>, Ye are come unto the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> giveth unto <S%H5414>us<s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5927>thee<s%>: go up, take <S%H3423>possession<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H3372>thee<s%>; fear <S%H2865>not<s%>, neither be dismayed.

And ye came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto me every one of <S%H559>you<s%>, and said, Let us <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2658>us<s%>, that they may search the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H7725>us<s%>, and bring us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> by which we must go <S%H5927>up<s%>, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> unto which we shall <S%H935>come<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> pleased me <S%H3190>well<s%>; and I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H259>you<s%>, one man for every <S%H376>tribe<s%>:
and they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and spied it <S%H7270>out<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and brought it <S%H3381>down<s%> unto <S%H7725>us<s%>, and brought us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> giveth unto <S%H5414>us<s%>.
Yet ye <S%H14>would<s%> not go <S%H5927>up<s%>, but <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>:

and ye <S%H7279>murmured<s%> in your <S%H168>tents<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Because <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8135>hated<s%> <S%H3318>us<s%>, he hath brought us forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, to destroy <S%H8045>us<s%>.

Whither are we going <S%H5927>up<s%>? our <S%H251>brethren<s%> have made our <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H4549>melt<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H7311>taller<s%> than <S%H5892>we<s%>; the cities are <S%H1419>great<s%> and fortified <S%H1219>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and moreover we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the Anakim <S%H6062>there<s%>.
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6206>you<s%>, Dread <S%H3372>not<s%>, neither be afraid of them.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3898>you<s%>, he will fight for <S%H6213>you<s%>, according to all that he did for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>,

and in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, where thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> how that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5375>bare<s%> <S%H376>thee<s%>, as a man doth <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> that ye <S%H1980>went<s%>, until ye <S%H935>came<s%> unto this <S%H4725>place<s%>.
Yet in this <S%H1697>thing<s%> ye did not <S%H539>believe<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>,

who <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, to seek you <S%H8446>out<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> to pitch your <S%H2583>tents<s%> <S%H784>in<s%>, in fire by <S%H3915>night<s%>, to <S%H7200>show<s%> you by what <S%H1870>way<s%> ye should <S%H3212>go<s%>, and in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words<s%>, and was <S%H7107>wroth<s%>, and <S%H7650>sware<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Surely there shall not <S%H376>one<s%> of these <S%H582>men<s%> of this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>,

save <S%H2108><s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>: he shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>; and to him will I give the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath trodden <S%H1869>upon<s%>, and to his <S%H1121>children<s%>, because he hath <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Also <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H1558>sakes<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou also shalt not <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H8033>thither<s%>:

60 <S%H3091><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, who <S%H5975>standeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>thee<s%>, he shall go in <S%H2388>thither<s%>: encourage thou <S%H3478>him<s%>; for he shall cause Israel to inherit <S%H5157>it<s%>.

Moreover your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, that ye <S%H559>said<s%> should be a <S%H957>prey<s%>, and your <S%H1121>children<s%>, that this <S%H3117>day<s%> have no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>evil<s%>, they shall go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5414>thither<s%>, and unto them will I give <S%H3423>it<s%>, and they shall possess it.
But as for <S%H6437>you<s%>, turn <S%H5265>you<s%>, and take your journey into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>.

Then ye <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2398>me<s%>, We have sinned against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, we will go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%>, according to all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2296>us<s%>. And ye girded on every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and were <S%H1951>forward<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>me<s%>, Say unto <S%H5927>them<s%>, Go not up, neither <S%H3898>fight<s%>; for I am not <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H5062>you<s%>; lest ye be smitten <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

So I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H8085>you<s%>, and ye hearkened <S%H4784>not<s%>; but ye rebelled against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and were <S%H2102>presumptuous<s%>, and <S%H5927>went<s%> <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>.

And the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in that <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>, came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H7291>you<s%>, and chased <S%H1682>you<s%>, as bees <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H3807>beat<s%> you down in <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, even unto <S%H2767>Hormah<s%>.

And ye <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not to your <S%H6963>voice<s%>, nor gave ear unto <S%H238>you<s%>.
So ye <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, according unto the <S%H3117>days<s%> that ye abode <S%H3427>there<s%>.
